comment.author: 12231268@N08
comment._content:
It's not the first trip, but indeed early in the life of this  trolley bus system. Number 2 was the first to run under the wires in late 1933, but double decker number 3 did not enter sdervice until September 1934. 
-Ian MacCowan.

comment.author: 36196524@N08
comment._content: I suspect that this photo is taken in Darlinghurst Road, looking south, with Bayswater Road to the left.  The tram track on the left appears to be swinging to merge with the other track, to form the Kings Cross tram terminus.

comment.author: 78367215@N04
comment._content: The perspective sounds correct. The buildings in front of the double decker are where the "Hyatt Kingsgate" was built. I seem to have hazy memories of the buildings from the early sixties as my Dad had an office just down the road at 146 William Street.
